-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Natural number to bit-list conversions
--   
@package opentheory-bits
@version 1.66


module OpenTheory.Natural.Bits
singleton :: Bool -> Natural
cons :: Bool -> Natural -> Natural
append :: [Bool] -> Natural -> Natural
headBits :: Natural -> Bool
bit :: Natural -> Natural -> Bool
bound :: Natural -> Natural -> Natural
fromList :: [Bool] -> Natural
tailBits :: Natural -> Natural
toList :: Natural -> [Bool]
toVector :: Natural -> Natural -> [Bool]
width :: Natural -> Natural


module OpenTheory.Natural.Uniform
random :: Natural -> Random -> Natural
